mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (user_no, user_id, user_pw, user_email, user_tel, user_name, postcode, address, address_detail) VALUES (#{user_no}, #{user_id}, #{user_pw}, #{user_email}, #{user_tel}, #{user_name}, #{postcode}, #{address}, #{address_detail});
mapper.select: SELECT user_id, user_pw, user_email, user_name, user_tel, postcode, address, address_detail FROM user WHERE user_id = #{user_id} AND user_pw = #{user_pw};
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET user_pw=#{user_pw}, user_email=#{user_email}, user_tel=#{user_tel}, postcode=#{postcode}, address=#{address}, address_detail=#{address_detail} WHERE user_id = #{user_id}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM user WHERE user_id = #{user_id} AND user_pw = #{user_pw};
